entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to communicate with someone underwater.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: A ghost who is floating in front of Harry and trying to help him communicate.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to communicate with Moaning Myrtle, but his voice is not coming out as words, only bubbles.
Moaning Myrtle is helping Harry by pointing to a location where he can try to communicate again.
